data.eml:eml: New isolate of Mononchoides composticola Steel, Moens, Scholaert, Boshoff, Houthoofd & Bert, 2011 (Nematoda: Neodiplogasteridae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shokoohi, Ebrahim, Seddiqi, Elahe, Panahi, Hadi, Abolafia, Joaquín (2015): New isolate of Mononchoides composticola Steel, Moens, Scholaert, Boshoff, Houthoofd & Bert, 2011 (Nematoda: Neodiplogasteridae) from Iran. Zootaxa 4044 (1): 141-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4044.1.8
